text:
@WhiteHouse @POTUS @realDonaldTrump 🇺🇸 Friday night CBS Show on COVID19 allowed Hospital nurses to verbally share how their faith in God 🙏 is where they get their strength during these trying times

Faith 👍 God👍 Jesus 👍Prayer 
                 Does Exist
I believe                    experience faith
